properties.Name: FinancialStatementLineNoteCrossReference
properties.Description: The cross-reference between a line on a financial statement and any notes that are applicable to the line.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the set of financial statements is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the set of financial statements is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Line.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementNoteId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a financial statement note.
